paper.title: Timing analysis in COSPAN
paper.venue: Proceedings of the DIMACS/SYCON workshop on Hybrid systems III : verification and control: verification and control
paper.abstract: We describe how to model and verify real-time systems using the formal verification tool Cospan. The verifier supports automata-theoretic verification of coordinating processes with timing constraints. We discuss different heuristics, and our experiences with the tool for certain benchmark problems appearing in the verification literature.
